style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=default;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;endArrow=blockThin;endFill=1;curved=1;strokeColor=#66B2FF;strokeWidth=2;" </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-17" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=default;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#66B2FF;curved=1;endArrow=blockThin;endFill=1;" </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-18" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=default;curved=1;endArrow=blockThin;endFill=1;strokeColor=#66B2FF;strokeWidth=2;" </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-19" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=default;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;endArrow=openThin;endFill=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#66B2FF;curved=1;" parent="1" source="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-15" target="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-15" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="40" y="110" /> <mxPoint x="68" y="110" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-20" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=default;endFill=1;dashed=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-36" y="-13" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="4" y="27" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-24" value="<p style="margin: 4px 0px 0px;"></p><span style=""><div style="text-align: center;"><span style="background-color: initial;">Λ</span></div></span><hr size="1"><div style="text-align: center; height: 2px;"><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">base = 1</p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">nextseqnum = 1</p></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-125" y="-58" width="85" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-25" value="<p style="margin: 4px 0px 0px;">rdt_rcv(rcvpkt) &amp;&amp;&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">corrupt(rcvpkt)</span></p><hr size="1"><div style="text-align: center; height: 2px;">Λ<br></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-213" y="17.5" width="180" height="45" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-26" value="<p style="margin: 4px 0px 0px;"></p><span style=""><div style=""><span style="">rdt_rcv(rcvpkt) &amp;&amp; notcorrupt(rcvpkt)</span><br></div></span><hr size="1"><div style="text-align: center; height: 2px;"><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">base = getacknum(rcvpkt)+1</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">if(base == nextseqnum)</span><br></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>stop_timer<br></span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">else</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>start_timer<br></span></p></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-57.5" y="112" width="195" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-27" value="<p style="margin: 4px 0px 0px;"></p><span style=""><div style=""><span style="">timeout</span><br></div></span><hr size="1"><div style="text-align: center; height: 2px;"><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">start_timer</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">udt_send(sndpkt[base])</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">udt_send(sndpkt[base+1])<br></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">...</p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">udt_send(sndpkt[nextseqnum-1])<br></p></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="112" y="-20" width="180" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-28" value="发送端" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=12;fontColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="17" y="245" width="46" height="18" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-29" value="<p style="margin: 4px 0px 0px;"></p><span style=""><div style=""><span style="">rdt_send(data)</span><br></div></span><hr size="1"><div style="text-align: center; height: 2px;"><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">if(nextseqnum &lt; base+N)</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">{</span><br></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>sndpkt[nextseqnum] = make_pkt(nextseqnum,data,checksum)<br></span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>udt_send(sndpkt[nextseqnum])<br></span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>if(base == nextseqnum)<br></span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>start_timer<br></span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>nextseqnum++<br></span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">}</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">else</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>refuse_data(data)<br></span></p></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="-243" width="360" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-30" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">等待</font>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontSize=12;fontColor=default;fillColor=#CCE5FF;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="440" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-31" value="<p style="margin: 4px 0px 0px;"></p><span style=""><div style=""><span style="">rdt_rcv(rcvpkt) &amp;&amp;</span><br></div><div style=""><span style="">noncorrupt(rcvpkt) &amp;&amp; hasseqnum(rcvpkt,expectedseqnum)</span></div></span><hr size="1"><div style="text-align: center; height: 2px;"><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">extract(revpkt,data)</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">deliver_data(data)</span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">sndpkt = make_pkt(expectedseqnum,ACK,checksum)<span style="background-color: initial;"><br></span></p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">udt_send(sndpkt)</p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">expectedseqnum++<br></p></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="279" width="320" height="135" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-32" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=default;endFill=1;dashed=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-36" y="421" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="4" y="461" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-34" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=default;endArrow=blockThin;endFill=1;strokeColor=#66B2FF;strokeWidth=2;curved=1;" parent="1" source="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-30" target="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-30" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="40" y="415" /> <mxPoint x="12" y="415" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-35" value="<p style="margin: 4px 0px 0px;"></p><span style=""><div style="text-align: center;"><span style="background-color: initial;">Λ</span></div></span><hr size="1"><div style="text-align: center; height: 2px;"><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">expectedseqnum = 1</p><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">sndpkt = make_pkt(0,ACK,checksum)<br></p></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-240" y="375" width="200" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-36" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=default;endArrow=blockThin;endFill=1;strokeColor=#66B2FF;strokeWidth=2;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;curved=1;" parent="1" source="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-30" target="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-30" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="40" y="545" /> <mxPoint x="68" y="545" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-37" value="<p style="margin: 4px 0px 0px;"></p><span style=""><div style="">default</div></span><hr size="1"><div style="text-align: center; height: 2px;"><p style="text-align: left; margin: 4px 0px 0px;">udt_snd(sndpkt)</p></div>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="548" width="90" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-38" value="接收端" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=12;fontColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="17" y="606" width="46" height="18" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="x91_GowXiQCPkuFZKrsu-39" value="GBN扩展FSM" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=20;fontColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-7.5" y="639" width="135" height="28" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
